title: A nevve comedy or enterlude, concernyng thre lawes of nature, Moises, and Christe, corrupted by the sodomytes, Pharysies, and papistes: compyled by Iohn Bale: and nowe newly imprynted.
author: Bale, John, 1495-1563.
publicationStmtDate: The yere of our Lord, M,D,LXII, [1562, 6 November]
publicationStmtPublisher: In S. brydes Churchyarde, ouer agaynste the north doore of the churche, by Thomas Colwell],
